title: Range Checker
code:
§begin in_range
  value ← 50
  min ← 10
  max ← 100
  §if value ⊗ min
    §if max ⊗ value
      §transmit "in range"
    §else
      §transmit "out of range"
    §end_if
  §else
    §transmit "out of range"
  §end_if
§end
solution_description: checks if a value is between a minimum and maximum using nested conditionals
hints: First checks if value > min, then if max > value
